tool_description: Structured Data Extractor for SEC 10-K Filings.
name: TextBlocks
title: TextBlocks

api_list.name: Filings
api_list.description: Retrieve all SEC 10-K filings for a specific company (including filing date, filing URL, and more).

api_list.name: Extractor
api_list.description: The Extractor endpoint returns structured text from a SEC 10-K filing. The endpoint enables users to specify the URL to be parsed, as well as a specific 10-K item to extract from the filing (e.g. 7A).
